|Culture = [[Dornishmen]]|Aka = }}'''Sarella Sand''' is an unseen character in the [[Season 4|fourth season]]. She is alluded to in "[[First of His Name]]".
sections.In the books:
In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Sarella is Oberyn's daughter whom he fathered on a ship captain from the [[Summer Islands]]. Her mother is the captain of the ''Feathered Kiss''.

Sarella has her mother's looks of dark brown skin, curly black hair, and black eyes, though like all the Sand Snakes she has her father's widow's peak and the same shape to her eyes.

She is nearly twenty years old, and has a reputation for insatiable curiosity and ''"pushing in where she didnâ€™t belong"''.  While Obara and Nymeria inherited their father's martial prowess, and Tyene his skill with poisons, Sarella inherited Oberyn's keen intellect.
sections.Biography:
===Background===
Sarella Sand is the fourth of the eight [[Bastardy|bastard]] daughters of [[Prince]] [[Oberyn Martell]], known as the "[[Sand Snakes]]".

===[[Season 4]]===
Oberyn mentions his eight bastard daughters to Queen [[Cersei Lannister]].<ref>"[[First of His Name]]"</ref>
